tag_list: management, green-key-management, seth-greenky, acting, agent, manager, film, television, entertainment
overview:
Seth Greenky is the owner of Green Key Management, LLC. His website is: www.GreenKeyManagement.com. Green Key Management, LLC is a Personal Management company in the entertainment business where he helps artists (mostly actors) by giving advice and counsel, as well as personal support. He represents, or has represented Emmy Winners, Emmy nominees, a Miss Russia, a Miss Universe (different person), a Broadway star, an R&B legend, and more. He has written extensively for “Backstage” in their “Ask A Manager” column and was also profiled in their “Industry Insider” section. Many articles, pix of clients, and much more on the website: www.GreenKeyManagement.com. ————————————————————————————————

Many people have submitted quotes for attribution (there are many more than these but here is a sampling):

I have known Seth since I was a teenager! He believed in me since day one. The first week I moved to NYC -he sent me on a ton of auditions-which later opened the doors for my life changing job on “All My Children”! I have the amazing life I have right now because of his belief in me. I owe him so much. Not to mention-he ALWAYS made me laugh when the going got rough! He’s good for that too! Alicia Minshew (Emmy Nominee, has been starring on ABC-TV on â€œAll My Childrenâ€ in the role of â€œKendall Hartâ€ since 2002)

I absolutely loved working with Green Key Management. Seth works incredibly hard, at all hours of the day. He took my phone calls at all hours of the night, and one time literally ran 80 blocks to come check on me. This is somebody you need to have on your team. Romi Dames (aka Traci Van Horn on Hannah Montana)

———————————————— â€œI have worked with Seth at GKM for over twenty years. He is always very professional, creative, cooperative and works to make the best possible situations for his clients. Any time I have asked him to send materials, he does so, promptly. He also is willing to sit and brainstorm about possible ideas and the best ways to implement them. He is known for making long term commitments to his clients, and goes way beyond the required efforts to bring out the best in each of them.â€ Vicki Roussman (Producer, VIR Productions, Winter Park, FL)

———————————————— “Seth has stuck with me for 4 years now. Lots of auditions and, for me, some close calls on big roles. He believes in me with no doubt and I believe in him. I guess you can’t ask for more in a manager… Or a friend.” John Serge (GKM Client, NYC) ————————————————

â€œGreen Key Management is a solid organization run by one of the most knowledgeable personal managers in the business. I consider myself blessed to have met Seth Greenky,the owner and CEO. He has enlightened me on a number of occasions with his expertise. If there is ever an obstacle or hurdle that gets in the way of my dreams or aspirations, I just call Seth.â€ Greg L. Glass (Actor, Writer, Producer, Director. Los Angeles) ————————————————

â€œGreen Key Management is AMAZING. I have an incredible team behind me and it really is helping jumpstart my dream/career. Seth doesnâ€™t usually take teens but Seth took me under his wing and now, thanks to him, I currently am getting tons of auditions and even a few meetings with really important people!â€ Martin Lewis (Client, NYC)

———————————————— “I’m proud to be a part of the Green Key Family. Seth is loyal and dedicated to the growth and advancement of his clientsâ€™ careers. I love the Hollywood hustle and I’m lucky to have such wonderful representation on my team. Collin Christopher (Client since 2004, LA)

———————————————— “Seth is a terrific manager. He really sticks by his clients and helps them in any way he can. And he’s got a great eye for talent!” Caroline Thomas, Total Theatre Lab http://www.totaltheatrelab.com/about.htm

â€œVery few managers will care as much and work AS HARD to make sure their clients get the shot they want to have the exact career they want.” J.D. Shapiro (Writer “Robin Hood: Men In Tights,” writer/director of the award winning movie “We Married Margo,” writer/director of the upcoming “Knights Of The Not So Round Table: The Lost Tapes of 524ad,” and co-creator along with legendary comic book creator Stan Lee of a new group of superheroes comingto save the world Oct. 2010.) http://jdshapiro.com) ————————————————

â€œGreen Key Management maintains a commitment to its roster. We are a big happy family. Mr. Seth is ethical, professional and responsible. Most importantly, he makes certain you are prepared. The body of work performed by his talent speaks for itself. If youâ€™re right for the role, you will get a chance to book it.â€ Michael Aurengier/aka Michael Orange, (client since 2006) ———————————————— Seth has been with me through thick and thin for many years. He is loyal, hardworking and never stops believing in your potential. If you are lucky enough to have him sign you, count your blessings because he never gives up on you.

Carolyn DeMerice (client since 2002), has run her own theater company, Jambalaya Productions for ten consecutive years in NYC.  As a producer she Co-Produced the feature film, â€œVirginâ€ starring Robin Wright Penn and Elisabeth Moss which was nominated for a 2004 Independent Spirit award. She has worked extensively both in front and behind the scenes in film and television production. Recently she shot the short Eve for the MFA film department at CCNY, and just finished a workshop for A Streetcar Named Desire playing Blanche Duboise.)

Thanks, guys & gals!
